reviews.review: You don't need me to tell you why this game is a masterpiece.
One of the best games ever for these reasons: it has clever puzzles, story is great, and Its pretty funny at times
Good puzzles, good story, good characters, good game.

good fun, fo sure. with a friend u can combine brains to maybe complete the game
Jeu mémorable incroyable. Tous simplement le meilleur jeu de puzzle et logique auquel j ai pus joué. Ce n'est pas pour rien que portal est meilleur que half life

Esta es una secuela de doble filo, hablando de historia y de final es espectacular, no me dejo nada que desear, pero hablando de puzzles en la primera mitad me parecieron mejores que en el primer juego, y en la segunda me parecieron mucho peores, algunos frustrantes, no porque fuesen dificiles de averiguar sino de ejecutar (es decir que la movilidad dificultaba las cosas muchisimo) fuera de eso recomiendo que compres este clasico
Это тот самый момент когда эксперимент пошел не по плану X2. Тут хороший сюжет и даже есть лор xD. Ну а еще тут есть картошка = )
Quite Possibly the Greatest game ever developed.
This is one of the best games I've ever played. The puzzles are amazing, the story is fantastic, and the overall package is huge. And with the workshop support, you have essentially endless content.
It can be pretty hard and that one conversion gel test with the lemon rant is stupidly hard, but it is a great game to protect yourself from brain drain
i'm a shooter player & i think this is the best puzzle game ever not to mention its funny too
Un des meilleurs jeux de ce siècle sans doute
portals and portal portal through the portals in portal
一款让人友尽的经典游戏

I have absolutely loved this game. The humour is brilliant. So dry and sarcastic, and quirky in a way I haven't experienced in any other game. The level of puzzle-solving and creativity that is both put out by the developers, and that is required of the player(s), is phenomenal. All-round money in the bank here. DEFINITE recommend!

Portal 2 is a great game. There are many game franchises that produce underwhelming sequels. This game however blew me away. It was a massive improvement in all aspects compared to the portal 1. Story, characters, visuals, and even the level designs/variety were superior to the first game. What really made this game shine however was the unique character interaction. Though it was a small cast, (consisting of mainly 4 characters) how they conversed felt very real and was extremely entertaining. If you're looking for a short but sweet game with a little bit of a challenge I'd highly recommend.
MORE tests!?! Great. well at least it's getting better. Well... HARDER. *WAIT HERE FOR BOOING* It's at least better than the first game. 11/10 rated by me.
Si, a no ser que no tengas amigos ._.
One of my favorite games of all time.

Игра очень интересная. Это не только головоломка,но и полноценная игра с сюжетом. Мне она очень нравится. Всем советую!

一刷9.4小时，觉得很好玩，玩法很创新，同时物理引擎做得很好。本人目前只通关了系统十章，创意工坊应该更有趣吧！双人合作感觉很棒。这个游戏感觉对思维认知逻辑等方面有帮助作用，建议游玩。以后一定要多多游玩。
어째서 내주변엔 포탈2 있는놈이 없고 어째서 코옵모드를 못하는걸까

[h1] Portal 2  [/h1]

[h1]| Genel Eleştiri [/h1]
Bir şeylerin kafa kurcalaması alışık olduğumuz bir şey, ancak Valve deneyimlerime ve portal izlenimlerime dayanarak, serinin bu 2. oyununda kafanızın kesinlikle pc,2den kaldıramayacağınıza garanti verebilirim. Öyle ki, bir noktadan bir noktaya portal açtığımız, bulmacaları çözerken formüller ürettiğimiz bir oyundan fazlası olacak bu sizin için. Serinin 2. oyununda ise hikayemiz kısaca geçmişte açtığımız izlerin gelecekte ki varyantını ortaya koyuyor diye bilirim sizlere.

[h1]| Hikaye [/h1]10/8 [h1]| Atmosfer [/h1]10/6 [h1]Müzik  [/h1]10/7 [h1]İlerleyiş ve Mekanik [/h1]10/9 [h1]Genel Durum [/h1]10/8
Да что тут говорить, огонь. Особенно кооп.
Игра супер, одиночный режим прошёл за 6 часов, жду тиму для коппа.Игрушка реально таких денег стоит, так же жду анонса 3-й части.
单单是和好友玩双人就已经high到不行了！不行了！我得去肝多人去了!!
Portal 2 — это расширенная и углубленная версия первой части, гораздо более длинная, насыщенная и, что немаловажно, смешная. В сиквеле разработчики, кажется, выжали все из исходной концепции.
Игра поражает маштабами и красотой некоторых уровней и развитее сюжета тоже крутое я офигел когда узнал что лабаратория находится очееь глубоко под землёй
Игра классная персонажи отличные проработаные интерено будет для людей котрые любят головоломки мой совет: игру проходить без туторов так будет интереснее и интереснее

Better than the first game. Great story and fun extra content. Also potato.

I cant give this game enough praise. Easily in my top 10 favorite games of all time. Story is great, graphics are really good for the time, mechanics are awesome, I really have no complaints with this game and would recommend it to anyone. Took about 6 hours to complete and was totally worth it.
